name: qr-chain-attendance
description: QR Chain Attendance System - Anti-cheat classroom attendance with peer-to-peer verification

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspaces && cd backend && npm test

scripts.test:property: npm run test:property --workspaces && cd backend && npm run test:property
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspaces && cd backend && npm run lint
